thread.title: Ohio State vs. Penn State | Scarlet & Gray Matter
thread.title_full: Ohio State vs. Penn State | Scarlet & Gray Matter | Buckeye Xtra Sports

author: The Columbus Dispatch
title: Ohio State vs. Penn State | Scarlet & Gray Matter
text:
The game at hand Short-attention-span synopsis: Ezek-lethal Elliott. Now we know what J.T. stands for: Just Touchdowns.
Pregame buzz: Nothing lukewarm about them. Fans love them or hate them. Gut feeling? There wasn’t quite enough AC/DC generated by the new look for the Buckeyes to be Back in Black anytime soon.
The $125 question: It felt more like Dark Night of the Soul more than Dark Night in the Shoe until Barrett blew into the game and the Buckeyes’ defense blew up Christian Sackenberg and the mood lightened considerably.
One-liner: Never seen Ohio Stadium so fit and trim. Black really is thinning.
Just wondering: Seriously, how far down the Ohio State MVP list do you go before reaching punter Cameron Johnston? Three? The Aussie saves the Buckeyes’ bacon almost every week.
%&$* auto-correct: The spelling police did to Braxton Miller what Penn State couldn’t: knocked the “L” out of him. Miller’s name was Miler before the H-back got it fixed between pregame and kickoff.
The view How the team sees it: We found something. Just not sure what it is.
How the pollsters will see it: Judging this team is like walking through a carnival funhouse. We’re not sure what is real and what is smoke and mirrors.
How Buckeye Nation will see it: Please, can we extend the red zone to the entire field?
Urban dictionary What he said: “That’s between me and my wife.” — playfully answering whose idea it was to call a jump pass that resulted in a touchdown.
What is means: “Brilliance runs in the family.”
If this were a 1950s TV show You name it, because everything was in black and white.
They said it As heard on TV: ABC brought the A-team — Kirk Herbstreit and Chris Fowler — and the duo did not disappoint. Fowler began with a “Blackout” winner: “It feels a little bit like a Marilyn Manson concert.” And Herbie had no problem sharing his opinion that Barrett needs to run the show for the Buckeyes.
As heard in stadium parking lot: One of the loudest cheers of the day, when Michigan State scored off a botched Michigan punt to win with no time left.
Numbers for dummies 1,998: total red buckeye leaf stickers affixed to the Buckeyes’ helmets
7-2: Urban Meyer’s record when Ohio State wears alternate uniforms.
On tap On the road at Rutgers, or considering its internal issues, Ruh-Roh-gers.
Tweethearts Best responses to @rollerCD on Twitter :
@myers_cheryl: Please Urban...Just grin and “Barrett”!
@michaelgunter06: helmet stickers look like something you would use to seal a Christmas card with.
@sylvaniaperl: JT shines bright light on Dark Night.
@kennethami: Who knew the red zone was 100 yards long. #jtbarrett
@BKerscher: So if Cardale starts next week he must have pictures of Urban streaking on the Oval #nobrainer
Horseshoe haiku All black in the ’Shoe 
more green in Buckeyes’ pocket 
Johnny Cashing in 
roller@dispatch.com 
@rollerCD
